ygData.subject: Welcome to the Iron Fist
ygData.msgSnippet: Down the corridor came the heavy clump of footsteps. Major Panzertron himself appeared. Welcome to the Iron Fist Zardus, he said looking around, Our scanners

  Down the corridor came the heavy clump of footsteps.
Major Panzertron himself appeared.

  "Welcome to the Iron Fist Zardus," he said looking
around,"Our scanners detected you had someone
accompanying you. Where are they or were we mistaken?"
